name: ai-counsellor-monorepo
description: AI Counsellor - Full Stack Study Abroad Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix frontend & (cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload)
